ygData.subject: RE: Innoruuk MIA list
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe u can login once in awhile to say hi to us.  Of course, if u can provide the taxi service, it is far better......  Oh, btw, pls read my signature.
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe u can login once in awhile to say hi to us. Of course, if u can provide the taxi
service, it is far better...... Oh, btw, pls read my signature. Keekeekeekekekeek

On Thu, 11 Nov 1999 16:35:17 +0800, LKW wrote:

>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>*tsk tsk*
>
>What to say leh? No motivation to login leh. Think of the camping and
>lvling also sian liao. Esp so many kakis already reach lvl 40 plus, me too
>weak to hunt those big mobs with u guys, hehe.
>
>Now I didn't login EQ, and seldom login UO too (coz very laggy due to some
>hardware problems at server side). Every night play Revenant, very cool
>game, hehe.
>
>I guess I also lost track with all the new stuffs in EQ (heard there is
>dunno simi new temple, new quests etc). Anyone can advise me what to do
>when I login, other than role-playing a public transport? ;P
>
>Freddy invited me into AC mailing list I also dun dare to join, scare to
>kena hook-up again (took me so long to 'lose' some interest in EQ and UO),
>hehe.
>
>Ziltus
>
>p/s: Also busy with my RL house renovation ;) If I dun get everything done
>by X'mas, next year I have to stay in those cheapskate Hotel 81 liao, hehe.
>
>On Thursday, 11 November, 1999 2:30 PM, Sereph
>[SMTP:garford@...] wrote:
>> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>>
>> Not in any particular order: Leshrec, Yutaka, Ziltus, Shinji, Trifrost
>> and Ling has went MIA from Innoruuk for way too long.
>>
>> Trifrost and Ling has more or less state their excuse, what about the
>> rest of you for still being MIA?
>>
>> Fesse Estasis, hyper unorganise leader of Avanguardia de Velorian
>>
>


Good Hunting,

FlyingFox Everest, Magician at his 40
